item.title: Cryptocurrency analysis - What to trade?
item.description: I recently developed a rudimentary method to identify the potential cryptocurrencies to BUY and trade. I did this exercise for Gramenerâ€™s blog. Reposting the same below. The actual article that I wrote can be found here I followed the below steps: Scraped the entire trading history of each of the cryptocurrencies available at CoinMarketCap Filtered cryptocurrencies based on Market capital, moving averages and Prices Ran a greedy search to identify the combination of moving averages that yielded maximum profits on cross over points trading strategy.
